timeline.bodyText:
I think we need to better explain what went wrong as the rules are a little complex. And don't forget that entity here can be null so at least you need to provides different error message in case an entity configuration exist (so you can add the name of the entity inside the error message) and none are set.
Normally, if we are here, this means that no database is configured via the entity annotation so one must be set inside the application.properties, we shoud compute the needed property and log it.
